history.proof: intros x y. hfcrush use: Rsqr_neg_pos_le_0, Rabs_pos, Rsqr_abs, Rabs_le, Rabs_def1, Rabs_def2, Rle_abs unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x y. split. - intros H. apply (proj1 (triangle_rectangle _ _ _) H). - intros [H1 H2]. apply (proj1 (triangle_rectangle _ _ _)). split; auto.
